Applies to

  • PCI DSS Requirement 6.5

What to Check For

Developers should be familiar with secure programming techniques.

How to Check

Interview the developers and ask them about their knowledge of secure programming techniques.

How to Fix

Have the developers study the TeamMentor and TeamProfessor materials.
